text: Barbara Ann Knudson Henry (December 4, 1927 â€“ May 11, 2014) was an American movie and television actress with more than forty professional credits, including starring roles in Meet Danny Wilson in 1952, The Cry Baby Killer in 1958, and The Jayhawkers! in 1959. Knudson died from natural causes at her home in Las Vegas, Nevada at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Las Vegas
title: Barbara Knudson
